msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Grid layers are now defined as type GridLayer (a private class), instead of Group.

GridLayer type no longer extends Group, it's now an object that has Group valued root property.   This makes the type's API relatively tiny - only two methods - and makes it possible for GridLayer to encapsulate the Grid itself as a layer (the item renderer layer).
Grid item renders are now consistently typed as IGridItemRenderer, rather than IVisualElement.
DefaultGridItemRenderer is now a UIFTETextField subclass and no longer supports the "textFieldClass" style.  A new UITextField based item renderer has been added, it's UITextFieldGridItemRenderer.

Support for the module implications of embedded fonts is now GridColumn's responsiblity.  GridColumn/itemToRenderer() now wraps item renderer ClassFactory item renders with a local ClassFactory subclass that delegates the newInstance() operation to the grid's moduleFactory.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Implement getItemRendererAt for an IR that is not currently visible.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix RTE in GridLayout. Removed some old code removing rowSeparators when the dataProvider changed. I also added ExcludeClass metadata for GridLayout.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixes and some code clean up for DataGrid. These fix issues with how the DataGrid looks when different indicators and separators are null. It also improves the look when the dataProvider is cleared.

GridLayout.as - Fix bug in layoutLinearElements() where we were allowing null values to stay in newVisibleElements. We should shorten the vector instead. Also, I fixed layoutSelectionIndicators() and layoutIndicator() to remove previously cached indicators when the factory is null. Lastly, fixed up layoutRow/ColumnSeparator to return the correct bounds when no item renderer exists. This is used in the case that we clear the dataProvider.
GridDimensions.as - Fix getPadRowBounds() so that it only never uses a negative index when calling getCellX and getColumnWidth.
DataGrid.as - use Grid's clearGridLayoutCache instead of manually clearing the caches.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Prevent the old layoutBoundsWidth width of recycled typical item renderers from affecting their computed bounds.
In Grid/generateColumns(), pass the same mysterious exclusion list to getClassInfo() as mx:DataGrid/generateCols(): ObjectUtil.getClassInfo(item, ["uid", "mx_internal_uid"])
